description: Opt for this thick, creamy berry smoothie on busy mornings. It’s easy to whip up and makes for a filling and refreshing snack.
keywords: Smoothie & frappé,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Mixed Berry & Chia Smoothies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.5 cup Macro Organic frozen mixed berries
2 tbs Macro Organic white chia seeds
1 cup Macro Organic long-life soy milk
0.25 cup Macro Organic Australian rolled oats

recipeInstructions.text: Reserve 1/4 cup berries and 1/4 tsp chia seeds. Place remaining berries and chia seeds in a blender with banana, milk, oats and yoghurt. Blitz until smooth.
Pour among 4 glasses. Top with remaining berries and chia seeds. Serve.
